column1: # - "TARGET_TRNA" is the tRNA used as an pipolin integration site;
# - "pipolin_structure" is an assembly gap that is introduced by EP
#     at the reconstruction step to join contigs that contain pipolin features;
# - "paired-ends" is an assembly gap introduced at the step of genome assembly;
# 1st column - either predefined feature (do not change the name!) or
#              exact product name in GBK file
# 2nd column - colour name (not used, just for user)
Type I restriction modification system methyltransferase (hsdM)
